summary:
ROVI - Product Ecosystem, Roadmap, Whitepaper, Litepaper, Community

 ROVI Money - 

 ROVI SuperDapp - 

 ROVI Keyboard - 

 ROVI Pay - 

 ROVI Super Wallet - 

 ROVI Wallet - Simplest Safest Crypto Wallet for the Masses - Login via Google and PIN, Cross Chain. Multi Assets, Buy/Sell in 200+ Countries, Fully Loaded Social Gaming and Entertainment

 ROVI Superdapp - Taking Crypto to Masses through Daily Lifeline Utility Rewards - Earn Daily Rewards on existing Messenger, Gaming, Payments, Redeem Rewards on Daily Life Utilities, Convert Rewards to $ROVI Crypto, Play Token Gated Casual Addictive Games, Pay in Fiat/Crypto at any Shop and earn Cashback Rewards

 ROVI Keyboard - Converting existing Messaging as a gateway to Crypto for Masses - Earn Rewards on WhatsApp/Telegram, Works on any Messenger, Redeem Rewards on Daily Life Utilities, Convert Rewards to $ROVI Crypto

 ROVI Pay - Converting Local Shops Payments as a gateway to Crypto for Masses - Create Prepaid Card in 1 Click, Pay at any Shop in Fiat, Earn Rewards as Cashback for Each Payment, Buy Real World Shop Assets Linked to Real Sales, Earn $ROVI Token Rentals for Owned Shop Assets
